Module com.example.battleship
Package com.example.battleship.controller

Class GameSession

java.lang.Object
com.example.battleship.controller.GameSession
public class GameSession extends Object
Singleton class to store game session data across screens. Implements the Singleton pattern for global state management. This class maintains player information, game settings, and statistics that persist throughout the application lifecycle.

Design Pattern: Singleton

Purpose: Centralized state management without global variables

Benefits: Single source of truth, easy access, thread-safe

Since:
2025-12-09
